code:
loop do
    d, w = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
    break if d == 0
    a = (1..d).map {gets.split.map(&:to_i)}
    max = 0
    (0..d-1).to_a.combination(2) do |y1, y2|
        next if y1 >= y2 - 1
        (0..w-1).to_a.combination(2) do |x1, x2|
            next if x1 >= x2 - 1
            h1 = (a[y1][x1..x2] + a[y2][x1..x2] + a[y1..y2].map{|r| r[x1]} + a[y1..y2].map{|r| r[x2]}).min
            h2 = 0
            v = h1 * (y2 - y1 - 1) * (x2 - x1 - 1)
            (y1+1..y2-1).each do |y|
                (x1+1..x2-1).each do |x|
                    h2 = a[y][x] if a[y][x] > h2
                    v -= a[y][x]
                end
            end
            next if h2 >= h1
            max = v if v > max
        end
    end
    p max
end

from itertools import product
while True:
    d, w = map(int, input().split())  # 高さdと幅w
    if d == 0:
        break
    gridgraph = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(d)]
    ans = 0
    for si, sj in product(range(1, d-1), range(1, w-1)):
        for ti, tj in product(range(si, d-1), range(sj, w-1)):
            # これで内部の池の範囲が指定できた
            # 内部の最大値を考えたい
            max_in_area = 0
            for i, j in product(range(si, ti+1), range(sj, tj+1)):
                max_in_area = max(max_in_area, gridgraph[i][j])

            # 周囲の最小値を考えたい
            huti_min = 100
            # 右方向を考えたい
            for i, j in product([si-1, ti+1], range(sj-1, tj+2)):  # rangeの仕様に注意
                huti_min = min(huti_min, gridgraph[i][j])

            # 下方向を考えたい
            for i, j in product(range(si-1, ti+2), [sj-1, tj+1]):  # rangeの仕様に注意
                huti_min = min(huti_min, gridgraph[i][j])

            if max_in_area >= huti_min:
                continue

            tmp = 0
            for i, j in product(range(si, ti+1), range(sj, tj+1)):
                tmp += huti_min - gridgraph[i][j]
            ans = max(ans, tmp)

    print(ans)
